mapper.select: select acceptid,releaseid,DATE_FORMAT(max(releasetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as releasetime,details,isread,user.nickname as nickname,user.cid from system_private_message,user where (acceptid=#{uid} and releaseid=user.id) or (releaseid=#{uid} and acceptid=user.id) group by nickname order by releasetime desc LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

select acceptid,releaseid,DATE_FORMAT(releasetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as releasetime,details,isread from system_private_message where (acceptid=#{uid} and releaseid=#{sid}) or (acceptid=#{sid} and releaseid=#{uid}) order by releasetime desc LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}
